entry.title: 40" Blush Mylar Foil Letter Helium Balloons - L
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3200
Type: Decorations
Price: 2.59

[About]

  • Material: Mylar Foil
  • Color: Blush 
  • Size: 40"
  • Letter: L
  • Balloons are shipped flat
  • Can be filled with air or helium
  • ﻿All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Big, Bold, and Beautiful! Our giant 40" Blush Foil Balloons are a real showstopper! With their seamless metallic sheen and gigantic glory, these gorgeous foil balloons will add a festive and fun-filled glitz and glam to your Wedding Party, Birthday Celebration, Baby or Bridal Shower, Graduation Ceremony, Anniversary Dinner, Holiday Functions, Christmas Party, and any other jubilant merriment.

With our exclusive selection of letters from A to Z, and numbers from 0 to 9, you can now easily and elegantly make customized banners, messages, and decorations. The mesmeric metallic finish of these foil balloons makes an eye-catching addition to your backdrops, photo booths, and party backgrounds. Get the balloons inflated in no time with our Balloon Hand Pumps or Portable Electric Air Blower Balloon Pump Inflators. The self-sealing valve helps in easy inflation and deflation, while a string can be inserted through tabs on the top of the balloon for easy hanging.

Run your imagination wild to create exciting decorative accents with these dazzling darlings. Choose the bride and grooms initials for a cute wedding photo prop, surprise your birthday girl or boy by displaying a sweet Happy B Day sign, or welcome a new bundle of joy in a glamorous manner with gold monogram balloons, create special occasions customized messages like Sweet 16 or 50 Years, decorate your backdrops, centerpieces, cake toppers, wishing trees, arches, and a lot more. The possibilities are countless when it comes to the versatility of these balloon decorations.

Additional Information:

  • Material: Mylar Foil
  • Color: Blush 
  • Size: 40"
  • Letter: L
  • Balloons are shipped flat
  • Uses: Balloon Bouquets, Balloon Centerpieces, Birthday Balloons, Wedding Balloons, Balloon Shop, Balloon Arch, Balloon Decoration, Balloon Columns
  • NOTE: CHOKING HAZARD - Children under 8 yrs. can choke or suffocate on un-inflated or broken balloons. Adult supervision required.  Keep un-inflated balloons away from children.  Discard broken balloons at once.

Suggested Pump To Use: click here

entry.title: 6FT Royal Blue Rose Chain Garland UV Protected Artificial Flower
entry.summary:

[Information]

Add blooming colors and festive glee to your home interiors, backdrops, aisles, and arches with our splendid rose chain garland selection that offers your favorite blossom in the color of your choice. Transform lackluster tablescapes, banisters, poles, or walls into extravagant display of radiant jubilancy with these faux rose garlands. Revitalizing green color contrasted with vibrant silk rose hues and delicate baby breath accents make these garlands true source of lively merriment. Crafted with intricate artistry, this rose chain garland mimics the fresh natural luster and attraction of real leaves and roses.

Faux leaves have surprising finishing details and gloss, while the prettily strung roses and baby breaths will leave the spectator awestruck at such life-like dexterity. Well concealed hooks allow you to adjust the garland your way. These gorgeous garlands will never wilt and lose their charismatic appeal and color, they can be reused and stored easily, giving you a perfect decorative accessory to create the magical realm of your dreams anytime, anywhere!

Additional Information:

[Information]

We name our most beautiful and extravagant Chandelier after iconic Queen Cleopatra, the most eminent name in the course of history known for her unsurpassed beauty, opulence, and cultural dominance. And why not! The unrivaled crystal clarity of acrylic diamond beads coupled with exotic design make this plush piece a true source of elegance and sparkle. Featuring multitudes of shiny faceted beads of high rate acrylic crystal modishly arranged in such a way that they are wrapped like a swag at the bottom. It looks like an optical illusion (like an upside-down hurricane) when beheld from different positions. Either hang these from roof, ceilings, arches, poles, or tree branches with or without LEDs and lights to create a truly mesmeric ambiance, or use these as charming centerpiece decorations with acrylic crystals and votive candles lit enticingly, creating dancing silhouettes all around.

entry.title: 10FT x 10FT - DIY Adjustable Metal Backdrop Support Stand - Photo Booth Backdrop Stand Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Backdrops
Price: 74.99

[About]

Material: Metal
Size: 10ft. x 10ft.
Cross Bar Diameter: 1cm Largest End

Package Includes:

  • 2 Support Stands (dies cast steel for quality build)
  • 1 Component Carrier
  • 2 27" Long Tripod Legs (Suggested Assembly Size: 26" wide x 22.5" high)
  • 3 Height Adjustable Levers per Support Stand
  • 2 Tightening Screw Bolts (1 for each top of support stand)
    		•
    All sizes are approximate measurements.
    Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]


    Our heavy duty backdrop support kit is highly durable, extremely stable, and surprisingly portable. Our sturdy portable backdrop stand kit is perfect to set up anywhere! Use it for holding up any of our backdrops or banners, for setting up peppy photo booths, and even for home and professional studio use. This high quality backdrop support kit is perfectly suitable for all level photographers from professional to amateurs. This portable backdrop kit can efficiently be used for both small and large groups, both in location and on studio due to its compact travel size and ease of setup. You can effortlessly disassemble it and fit in a handy travel bag. Now, its that simple to take your studio backdrops with you on location with an ease of size and weight. The black finish is durable and highly professional. You can use it efficiently for both fabric (canvas/muslin) and paper backgrounds. Our multipurpose backdrop support kit can ideally be used for shooting at your preferred location, for portraits and interviews, and even for a mobile photography studio!

    Our Pipe and Drape Kits are designed for the rigors of commercial/Heavy use. They are strong and stable enough to support multiple fabric layers, props, lights, etc

    Additional Information:

    • Maximum Height is 10ft
    • Minimum Height is 53.5"
    • Maximum Width is 10ft
    • Minimum Width is 26"


    More Space to Cover

    • Purchase two: 10ft x 20ft wide
    • Purchase three: 10ft x 30ft wide


    Comes With:

    • 2 support stands (die cast steel for quality build)
    • 1 Component Carrier
    • 2 Tripod Leg stands: 27long -Suggested Size: 26 wide x 22.5 tall
    • 3 height adjustable levers per support stand
    • 2 tightening screw bolts (1 for each top of support stand)
    • Cross bar diameter: 1cm Largest End


    How to set up:

    1. Connect BAR A to BAR B to BAR D
    2. To Tighten: Turn Knob RIGHT
    3. To Loosen: Turn Knob LEFT

    Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Photography, Exhibition Decoration

    Note: Sand Weight Bags and other accessories not included.

    [Information]

    Enchanting Easter Lilies symbolize the sacred attributes of virtue, purity, innocence, and hope. They bring forth the spiritual essence of Easter, though people love to use them for other merry occasions too like Weddings, Anniversaries, Showers, Church events, and also for home decoration. Also known as November Lily, these pretty blossoms are now available in an undying silk version with unsurpassed radiance and perpetual bloom. These faux lilies feature six outward facing flowers that shape like trumpets and are accented with ivory stamen in the middle. Life like green foliage on the stem gives an amazingly realistic look to the bouquet. Decorate your centerpieces, vases, backdrops, gardens, flower arrangements, and other decorations with our gorgeous Easter lily bouquets.
